designation.legalReferenceName: Ligji "Per Zonat e Mbrojtura",Nr. 8906, date 06.06.2002, art.4
designation.competentAuthorityOrganisationName: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Water Administration
designation.remark: Due to the institutional changes of November 2005 the Protected Areas Administration is now under the Ministry of Environment, Forest and water Administration
designation.remarkSource: Organization and structure of the Council of Ministrers in Albania, September 2013
